name: lastfm
title: Last.fm
description: Display your favourite, recently played tracks, your top albums and artists and more from Last.fm on Raycast!
author: eggsy

commands.title: Background Scrobbling

commands.description: Automatically scrobble music in the background

commands.title: Scrobbling Dashboard

commands.description: View scrobbling status and manage queue

commands.name: combined
commands.title: Top & Recent Songs

commands.description: Display your top and recent songs!

preferences.name: apikey
preferences.description: You can get one from https://www.last.fm/api/accounts
preferences.title: API key

preferences.name: apisecret
preferences.description: Your Last.fm API secret (needed for scrobbling)

preferences.title: Username

Period

preferences.title: Scrobble Interval

preferences.title: Minimum Play Duration
preferences.name: minPlayDuration
preferences.description: Minimum seconds a track must play before scrobbling (Last.fm requirement: 30s)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
